Events that occurred on 15 May

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 99.
1945 - Inkling Charles Williams dies.
1967 - Linguist Ivan Derzhanski is born.
2004 - The Tolkien Society's Tolkien Weekend in Sarehole, Birmingham.
2007 - Artist Angus McBride dies.
2010 - The Tolkien Society's Middle-earth Weekend in Sarehole, Birmingham.
2015 - Voice actor John Stephenson dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
